org.payments4j.core
Interface PaymentGateway

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPaymentGateway, AuthorizeNetPaymentGateway, CybersourcePaymentGateway, PayFlowProPaymentGateway
public interface PaymentGateway

Interface that all PaymentGateway's must implement.

Usually most PaymentGateways will support purchase, authorize, capture, revert(void) and credit transactions.

Only some PaymentGateways support recurring transactions as well as storing/evicting credit card data.

Method Detail

purchase

TransactionResponse purchase(Money money,
                             CreditCard creditCard,
                             Map<String,Object> options)
Runs a purchase(authorize+capture) transaction against the PaymentGateway.

Parameters:
money - Amount for the transaction.
creditCard - Credit Card to charge the transaction to.
options - Optional Gateway-specific data, that will be sent to the Gateway service.
Returns:
The response from the gateway.
